New York University Abu Dhabi Library
Al Qassim Family Collection
Al Qasim, Abdulghafoor, Mr.
AD.MC.031
143 Photographic Prints 143 digital surrogates of photographic prints
1960-1980 This collection of photos represents the personal photography of Mr. Abdulghafoor Alqasim from different areas of United Arab Emirates. The images date from both before and after the birth of UAE as a country in 1971 as well as Mr. Abdulghafoor's trips to other countries throughout the world. The collection reflects Mr. Abdulghafoor's interest in photography when he was a student in Dubai in the nineteen-sixties and extends decades into the era of digital photography. Akkasah has worked closely with Mr. Abdulghafoor to assure that his family's photographs are digitally preserved not only for the sake of posterity but also to serve as important cultural documents of the birth and rapid growth of the United Arab Emirates as a nation. Digital surrogates only - physical objects not deposited
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Arrangement
Collection was digitized as it was recieved.
Biographical / Historical
.
Custodial History
Akkasah, the Center for Photography at NYU Abu Dhabi, acquired the collection in February 2017.
Scope and Contents
This collection of photos represents the personal photography of Mr. Abdulghafoor Alqasim from different areas of United Arab Emirates. The images date from both before and after the birth of UAE as a country in 1971 as well as Mr. Abdulghafoor's trips to other countries throughout the world. The collection reflects Mr. Abdulghafoor's interest in photography when he was a student in Dubai in the nineteen-sixties and extends decades into the era of digital photography. Akkasah has worked closely with Mr. Abdulghafoor to assure that his family's photographs are digitally preserved not only for the sake of posterity but also to serve as important cultural documents of the birth and rapid growth of the United Arab Emirates as a nation.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Mr. Abdulghafoor Alqasim are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact Akkasah at akkasah@nyu.edu
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Collection obtained directly from Mr. Abdulghafoor Alqasim.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; The Al Qassim Collection; AD_MC_031; box number; folder number or item identifier; Akkasah Center for Photography, New York University.
